prompt: Create a comprehensive notifications page with a clean white background and organized layout. Display a prominent 'Notifications' title at the top using large, bold dark gray text. Below the title, implement a scrollable list of notification cards, each featuring a circular avatar on the left with colorful background gradients, followed by notification content including sender name, message preview, and timestamp. Each notification card should have subtle elevation shadow, rounded corners, and proper spacing between elements. Include visual indicators for unread notifications using a small blue dot. The overall design should follow Material Design principles with consistent typography hierarchy and comfortable touch targets.
